import videojs from 'video.js';
import './items/srg-subtitles-menu-size-item.js';
import SRGMenu from '../srg-menu.js';
import Utils from '../../../../utils/Utils.js';
import * as Events from '../../../../utils/Events.js';

/**
 * LetterBox Subtitles Menu component
 *
 * @ignore
 */
class SubtitlesMenu extends SRGMenu {
  constructor(player, options) {
    const opt = videojs.mergeOptions({
      children: {
        subtitlesButton: true,
      },
    }, options);

    super(player, opt);

    this.state = {};
    this.setSubtitleButtonState = this.setSubtitleButtonState.bind(this);

    this.player().textTracks().on(Events.CHANGE, this.setSubtitleButtonState);
  }

  /**
   *@override
   */
  updateState() {
    this.state.audioDescription = this.buildAudioDescription();
    this.state.audio = this.buildAudio();
    this.state.subtitles = this.buildSubtitles();
    this.setSubtitleButtonState();
  }

  /**
   * Set the subtitle button state
   */
  setSubtitleButtonState() {
    const subtitleActive = 'srg-menu__subtitles-button--active';
    const currentSubtitle = this.state.subtitles && this.state.subtitles.value();

    if (currentSubtitle && currentSubtitle !== 'off') {
      this.player().$('.srg-menu__subtitles-button').classList.add(subtitleActive);

      return;
    }

    this.player().$('.srg-menu__subtitles-button').classList.remove(subtitleActive);
  }

  buildSubtitles() {
    const tracks = Array.from(this.player().textTracks())
      .filter(({ kind, language }) => !['metadata', 'forced'].includes(kind) && language.length);

    if (tracks.length < 1) {
      return undefined;
    }

    const items = tracks
      .map(({ label, language: value, kind }) => ({ label, value, badge: kind === 'captions' ? kind : false }));

    items.unshift({ label: this.localize('Off'), value: 'off' });

    return {
      label: 'Subtitles',
      type: SRGMenu.PANEL_COMPONENTS_TYPES.LIST,
      widget: this.buildSubtitleSizeSelector(),
      items,
      changeTarget: () => this.player().textTracks(),
      changeEvent: [Events.ADD_TRACK, Events.CHANGE],
      value: () => {
        const currentTrack = tracks.find(track => track.mode === 'showing');

        if (currentTrack) {
          return currentTrack.language;
        }

        return 'off';
      },
    };
  }

  buildSubtitleSizeSelector() {
    if (this.player().tech().featuresNativeTextTracks) {
      return undefined;
    }

    return {
      label: 'Size Selector',
      type: 'SRGSubtitlesMenuSizeItem',
      name: 'subtitlesSize',
      changeEvent: Events.TEXT_TRACK_SIZE_CHANGE,
      value: () => this.player().getChild('TextTrackDisplay').fontSize,
    };
  }

  buildAudioDescription() {
    const tracks = Array.from(this.player().audioTracks())
      .filter(({ kind }) => Utils.isAudioDescription(kind));

    if (tracks.length < 1) {
      return undefined;
    }

    return {
      label: 'Audio Description',
      type: SRGMenu.PANEL_COMPONENTS_TYPES.TOGGLE,
      changeTarget: () => this.player().audioTracks(),
      changeEvent: [Events.ADD_TRACK, Events.CHANGE],
      value: () => tracks.filter(({ enabled }) => enabled === true).length > 0,
    };
  }

  buildAudio() {
    const tracks = Array.from(this.player().audioTracks());

    if (tracks.length < 2) {
      return undefined;
    }

    const items = tracks
      .map(({ label, id: value, kind }) => ({ label: label.split(' (AD)').join(''), value, badge: Utils.isAudioDescription(kind) ? 'audio-description' : false }));

    return {
      label: 'Audio',
      type: SRGMenu.PANEL_COMPONENTS_TYPES.LIST,
      items,
      changeTarget: () => this.player().audioTracks(),
      changeEvent: [Events.ADD_TRACK, Events.CHANGE],
      value: () => {
        const currentTrack = tracks.find(({ enabled }) => enabled);
        if (currentTrack) {
          return currentTrack.id;
        }
        return null;
      },
    };
  }

  buildCSSClass() {
    return `subtitles-menu ${super.buildCSSClass()}`;
  }
}

videojs.registerComponent('SubtitlesMenu', SubtitlesMenu);
export default SubtitlesMenu;
